Title: Machine Gun Preacher
Overview: The true story of Sam Childers, a former drug-dealing biker who finds God and became a crusader for hundreds of Sudanese children who've been kidnapped and pressed into duty as soldiers.
Tagline: Hope is the greatest weapon of all
production_companies: Mpower Pictures, Relativity Media, 1984 Private Defense Contractors, Virgin Produced, Moonlighting Films, Apparatus Productions, GG Filmz, ITS Capital, Merlina Entertainment, MGP Productions, Safady Entertainment
Cast: Gerard Butler, Michelle Monaghan, Kathy Baker
